org.apache.lucene.queryParser.core.nodes
Class TokenizedPhraseQueryNode

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.queryParser.core.nodes.QueryNodeImpl
      org.apache.lucene.queryParser.core.nodes.TokenizedPhraseQueryNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, FieldableNode, QueryNode
public class TokenizedPhraseQueryNode
extends QueryNodeImpl
implements FieldableNode

A TokenizedPhraseQueryNode represents a node created by a code that tokenizes/lemmatizes/analyzes.

See Also:
Serialized Form
